Creatives
Landing

Lead frontend developer for Creatives landing, an interactive portfolio page built for Motiv Studio showcasing their creative projects and digital talent.
Visit Site

My Role

For this project, I was tasked with developing the entirety of the frontend experience. I designed and built out the architecture of the website from scratch, planning accordingly for the necessary features to make this project shine: unique animations, slide-based scroll, and its various interactions.

Playful scroll-based
slides and their animations
bring the site to life.
